channel.title: Comments on: What am I thankful for?
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Daniel
item.dc:creator: Daniel
item.description: Nice post Ted. You mentioned"..The drive gives me time to catch podcasts and other audio type training materials...". I drive a lot too and was looking for audio training material(anything SQL/Database related) that I can listen to while driving. Could you advise me what/how to get one? Thanks.
item.content:encoded: Nice post Ted. You mentioned”..The drive gives me time to catch podcasts and other audio type training materials…”. I drive a lot too and was looking for audio training material(anything SQL/Database related) that I can listen to while driving. Could you advise me what/how to get one? Thanks.

item.title: By: Eli Weinstock-Herman (tarwn)
item.dc:creator: Eli Weinstock-Herman (tarwn)
item.content:encoded:
Ted inspired me, but I wasn’t up to a blog post so I statred a forum thread instead:

“I’m thankful for…”
http://forum.lessthandot.com/viewtopic.php?f=100&t=12991

item.title: By: Tahir Khalid
item.dc:creator: Tahir Khalid
item.description: I wish I had real friends (imaginary people in my head and toys don't count unfortunately)
item.content:encoded: I wish I had real friends (imaginary people in my head and toys don’t count unfortunately)

item.title: By: Sarah Sjolander
item.dc:creator: Sarah Sjolander
item.content:encoded:
Great post, Ted! I (Twitter friends) am thankful for you and your sense of humor. I look forward to the morning hellos with you, Jes (grrl_geek), and Bob (SQLBob) every day!

I hope you and your family have a wonderful Thanksgiving (and safe travels)!
